column4: Can anyone provide some direction on how to get a usb phone to work with Ubuntu?  I want to use it with Skype.  Thanks.
wut happens when you plug it in? wut model phone is it? :D
the installer, are you talking about when you install it from syanptic, or the installer CD?
Model UP-90 from Geeks.com.  System does not recognize it. No sounds from phone.
oh ok, yea, if you press esc you should get a list of the steps, so you can then skip down to the grub part w/o reinstalling all of ubuntu
ah...i dont know if grub installer is accessible through shell :(
is it a limited shell or can you actually do commands like use nano or other command-line programs?
maybe like a "sudo apt-get install grub --reinstall" ?
ok, did u try that apt-get command?
gah! apt-get command ocmment was to Carl
lol, sry Carl, never heard of anna :(
Model UP-90 from Geeks.com.  System does not recognize it. No sounds from phone.
rgr ubuntu_noob, im looking on Google for anything
i googled but without success.  Thanks for looking.
can you give me the output of lsusb in a command line?
